title: Purchasing Coordinator
job_overview:
We’re Hiring: Remote Purchasing Coordinator (PH-based)
Night Shift (U.S. Pacific Time) | Full-Time | Up to $7/hour

We’re looking for a reliable Purchasing Coordinator to join a growing U.S.-based food brand. If you’re organized, great with spreadsheets, and have experience handling procurement or admin tasks—we’d love to hear from you!

What You’ll Do:
- Help manage inventory and supply orders across 7+ kitchens
- Coordinate with vendors and track deliveries
- Handle returns, refunds, and invoices
- Keep records updated and systems organized

What We’re Looking For:
- 3+ years experience in purchasing, admin, finance, or a similar role
- Strong skills in spreadsheets and written English
- Bonus if you’ve worked in food service, hospitality, or with U.S. clients

How to Apply:
- Send your resume and email introduction to: Upgrade to see actual info
- Subject Line: Your Name – Applicant for Purchasing Coordinator
Example: Juan Dela Cruz – Applicant for Purchasing Coordinator

Please do not send via Direct Message—we’ll only review applications sent by email.

We’re excited to meet detail-oriented, proactive professionals who want to grow with a remote-first team!
